Sentencas: Compositions in the pyrochlore system Y2Zr2O7 (YZ) and Y2Zn2-xMnxO7-delta (YZM) (where x=0.025, 0.05, 0.075 and 0.10) were examined as possible alternatives to stabilised zirconia solid oxide electrolyte in intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFC).
Titulo: Y2Zr2O7 (YZ)-pyrochlore based oxide as an electrolyte material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFCs) -: Influence of Mn addition on YZ

Sentencas: Such materials were prepared by glycine-nitrate combustion process.
Titulo: Y2Zr2O7 (YZ)-pyrochlore based oxide as an electrolyte material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFCs) -: Influence of Mn addition on YZ

Sentencas: The prepared compounds were characterised by X-Ray Diffraction and Thermal analysis.
Titulo: Y2Zr2O7 (YZ)-pyrochlore based oxide as an electrolyte material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFCs) -: Influence of Mn addition on YZ

Sentencas: Circular pellets were fabricated and annealed at different temperatures ranging from 1000 to 1400 degrees C.
Titulo: Y2Zr2O7 (YZ)-pyrochlore based oxide as an electrolyte material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFCs) -: Influence of Mn addition on YZ

Sentencas: The sintering behaviour of YZ and YZM were investigated to obtain information on the densification factor, relative percentage shrinkage/expansion in volume after heat treatment and apparent porosity value.
Titulo: Y2Zr2O7 (YZ)-pyrochlore based oxide as an electrolyte material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFCs) -: Influence of Mn addition on YZ

Sentencas: The small doping level of Mn (<= 10.0 wt%) resulted in increased conductivity values.
Titulo: Y2Zr2O7 (YZ)-pyrochlore based oxide as an electrolyte material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFCs) -: Influence of Mn addition on YZ

Sentencas: The component diffusion coefficients and mobility of ions are calculated from its conductivity value.
Titulo: Y2Zr2O7 (YZ)-pyrochlore based oxide as an electrolyte material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFCs) -: Influence of Mn addition on YZ

Sentencas: D-comp and mu(i) are found in the range of 10(-8)
